title: Body copy typeface in Rolling Stone magazine?
content: What is the typeface used for body copy in the Rolling Stone magazine? I have gone through about 40 typefaces trying to identify certain letters, and still cannot come up with an exact match. There's a sans serif and a serif that I see used in articles, and I'd like to find out what they are if possible.
author: Fantômas

comments.content:
Look here:

[http://typophile.com/node/7059](http://web.archive.org/web/20130722194038/http:/typophile.com/node/7059 "http://typophile.com/node/7059")

Old thread but new posts.  
Sans: Amplitude (Proxima?)  
Serif: FB Hightower
